ValidationRule.description: When User SelectDraft/Pay Order of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection then not entering data in Cheque/DD Amount (Rs.)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'Draft/Pay Order') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c , 'Rupees') , ISBLANK( Cheque_DD_Amount_Rs__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting Draft/Pay Order of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection Pick List,Cheque/DD Amount (Rs.) cann't be blank.
